name: Night Stalker DX
description: To play the game, you'll need an X-Box compatible controller. Note that during the game you can use the D-Pad to move your player, but it's suggested that you use the left joystick since there's less of a chance to create errors.  This is a Gamemaker Studio 2 created game and the developer would like to continue to make progress on it with the assistance of potential collaborators and other fans of the original.
